column3: I highly recommend trying the tofu scramble with soyrizo
column5: and avocado. If you order corn tortillas instead of toast you can make delicious breakfast tacos. My fianc√© loves the scramble with barbacoa
column8: so that's a great option for omnivores. The hashbrowns at Snooze are the best
column9: so definitely be sure and try those while you're there. There are also gluten free pancakes
column10: but unfortunately they're not vegan (please change that
column11: Snooze! Vegan pancakes are super easy to make and better for the planet!). Overall
column12: we love Snooze and will continue to make it a weekly Saturday treat.
